alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 11 at 2:34PM MDT until October 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Generally 8 to 16 inches expected above 8,000 feet. Totals of 20 to 30 inches expected above 10,000 feet. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult including along Highway 28. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hunters and others heading into the backcountry should prepare for wet and cold conditions. Heavy, wet snow could make for difficult travel on unpaved mountain roads, especially above 8,000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
